content: Family Lifestyle Asked by Kenneth LouAsked on 14 Feb 2019Happy Valentine's Day! $500 MBS Staycation with a Michelin dinner OR $20 Hawker Picnic under The stars with hawker food?Just a fun pop quiz. Simply answer below!6 answersAnswerBump2
Answers (6)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Leong Wen Fong, Community Lead at SeedlyLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 14 Feb 2019If I were the one spending, then definitely the picnic.I think staycation everywhere would be overpriced, and I rather save up for overseas holidays.Unfortunately there are not a lot of places in SG where you can actually see the stars.That being said, if it were sponsored then of course I'll take the staycation, cos I'm a #trueblueSingaporean that loves free stuff too0 comments1
Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 14 Feb 2019Staycation! Especially if sponsored! 0 comments1

HC Tang, Financial Enthusiast, Budgeting at The SocietyLevel 8. WizardUpdated on 07 Jun 2019$500 MBS Staycation with a Michelin dinner== I Want!!! If someone sponsor! hahahaha!$20 Hawker Picnic under The stars with hawker food== I will be kill for this! haha..2 comments1

Yong Kah HweeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 15 Feb 2019Late reply, but I'd choose the picnic! I'm quite stingy with my money one haha0 comments0

Brandan Chen, Financial Planner at Manulife SingaporeLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 14 Feb 2019Of cos if i win some lucky draw, a staycation will be preferred. Honestly, i rather spend the S$500 bucks on a short getaway!0 comments0
